name: The Last Barbarian
description:
Overview

The Last Barbarian is a 3D action role-playing hack and slash game.
You control a barbarian who is ready to complete his tribe ceremony: "trial of warriors".
In this test the fighters need to pass the ancients' path, but under the test something unexpected happens, and the barbarian gets into dangerous situation, furthermore he also must find a way back to his home.

Features

-Real-time combat
-Boss fights
-Items, Talents, Skills
-Puzzles
-Traps
